Theory paths

(*
    Author: Lise Arendsen, TU/e
*)

section ‹Defining paths, some functions and results›

theory paths
imports syntaxsemantics
begin

lemma inductfiniteset : 
  assumes "finite A"
  and "P {}"
  and "⋀a A'. (a ∈ A-A' ∧ P A') ⟹ P (insert a A')" 
  shows "P A"
  apply (rule finite_induct_select; simp add: assms)
  using psubset_imp_ex_mem apply blast
  done

text ‹We define finite paths as lists of transitions
and infinite paths as mappings from natural numbers to transitions.›

type_synonym ('a, 's) finpath = "('s × 'a × 's) list"
type_synonym ('a, 's) infpath = "('s × 'a × 's) word"

text ‹A transition can be splitted into its source, action, and target.›

definition source :: "('a × 'b × 'c) ⇒ 'a" where
"source t = fst t"

definition action :: "('a × 'b × 'c) ⇒ 'b" where
"action t = fst (snd t)"

definition target :: "('a × 'b × 'c) ⇒ 'c" where
"target t = snd (snd t)"

lemma sourceactiontargetsimp [simp] :
  shows "source (s, a, s') = s"
  and "action (s, a, s') = a"
  and "target (s, a, s') = s'"
  by (simp_all add: source_def action_def target_def)

lemma splittransition [simp] : "(source t, action t, target t) = t"
  by (simp add: source_def action_def target_def)

text ‹Then we define the notion of valid paths, a finite path is valid with respect to its first 
state and last state, while an infinite path is valid only with respect to its first state.›

fun validfinpath :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath ⇒ 's ⇒ bool" where
"validfinpath M s [] s' = (s = s')" |
"validfinpath M s (t#ts) s' = (s = source t ∧ t ∈ transition M ∧ validfinpath M (target t) ts s')"

definition validinfpath :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) infpath ⇒ bool" where
"validinfpath M s p = (s = source (p 0) ∧ (∀n. p n ∈ transition M ∧ (target (p n) = source (p (Suc n)))))"

text ‹A path is either a finite path or an infinite path.›

datatype ('a, 's) path = fin "('a, 's) finpath" | inf "('a, 's) infpath"

fun validpath :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"validpath M s (fin p) = (∃s'. validfinpath M s p s')" |
"validpath M s (inf p) = validinfpath M s p"

text ‹Define ‹enabled› and ‹locked›.›

definition enabledactionsset :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 's set ⇒ 'a set" where
"enabledactionsset M S' = {a . (∀s ∈ S'. ∃s'. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M)}"

abbreviation enabledactions :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 's ⇒ 'a set" where
"enabledactions M s ≡ enabledactionsset M {s}"

lemma enabledactions_def [simp] : "enabledactions M s = {a . (∃s'. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M)}"
  by (simp add: enabledactionsset_def)

definition enabled :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 's ⇒ 'a set ⇒ bool" where
"enabled M s α ≡ (∃ a ∈ α. a ∈ enabledactions M s)"

lemma actionenabled : "enabledactions M s ≠ {} = (∃a s'. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M)"
  by simp

definition locked :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ bool" where
"locked M B s = (enabledactions M s ⊆ B)"

lemma lockednegenabled : "locked M B s = (¬enabled M s (-B))" 
  by (auto simp: locked_def enabled_def)

text ‹A finite path matches a regular formula if and only if its sequence of actions is in the language 
of the regular formula.›

definition match :: "'a rexp ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath ⇒ bool" where
"match ρ p = (map action p ∈ lang ρ)"

text ‹A finite path matches a regular formula n times if and only if its sequence of actions is in the 
language of the regular formula concatenated n times.›

fun matchntimes :: "nat ⇒ 'a rexp ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath ⇒ bool" where
"matchntimes 0 R p = (p = [])" |
"matchntimes (Suc n) R p = (∃p' p''. p = p' @ p'' ∧ match R p' ∧ matchntimes n R p'')"

text ‹A finite path ‹p› matches ‹Star R› (Kleene star) if and only if there exists ‹n› such that 
‹p› matches ‹R› ‹n› times. Makes reasoning about matching ‹Star R› easier›

lemma matchstar_eq_matchntimes : "match (R⇧⋆) p = (∃n. matchntimes n R p)"
proof-
  have "match (Star R) p = (map action p ∈ (⋃n. (lang R) ^^ n))" by (simp add: match_def star_def)
  moreover have "... = (∃n. map action p ∈ (lang R) ^^ n)" by auto
  moreover have "∀n. (map action p ∈ (lang R) ^^ n) = (matchntimes n R p)"
  proof
    fix n
    show "(map action p ∈ (lang R) ^^ n) = (matchntimes n R p)"
    apply (induct n arbitrary : p; simp)
    proof-
      fix n
      fix p :: "('a, 's) finpath"
      assume assum1 : "(⋀(p :: ('a, 's) finpath). (map action p ∈ lang R ^^ n) = matchntimes n R p)"
      have "(map action p ∈ lang R @@ lang R ^^ n) = (∃p' p''. p = p' @ p'' ∧  ((map action p') ∈ lang R) ∧ ((map action p'') ∈ lang R ^^ n))" by (rule exists_map_abinconc)
      moreover have "... = (∃p' p''. p = p'@p'' ∧  match R p' ∧  matchntimes n R p'')" using assum1 by (auto simp: match_def) 
      ultimately show "(map action p ∈ lang R @@ lang R ^^ n) = (∃p' p''. p = p' @ p'' ∧ match R p' ∧ matchntimes n R p'')" by simp
    qed
  qed
  ultimately show ?thesis by blast
qed

text ‹Simplifications of match for all patterns of regular formulas.›

lemma matchunfold [simp] : 
  shows "match Zero p = False"
  and "match One p = (p = [])"
  and "match ({a}⇩R) p = (∃t. p = [t] ∧ action t = a)"
  and "match (R +⇩R Q) p = (match R p ∨ match Q p)"
  and "match (R ⋅ Q) p = (∃p' p''. p = p' @ p'' ∧ match R p' ∧ match Q p'')"
  apply (simp_all add: match_def exists_map_abinconc)
  apply (rule iffI; auto)
  done

lemma matchunfoldActslist [simp] : "match (Actslist A) p = (∃t. p = [t] ∧ action t ∈ set A)"
  by (induct A; auto)

lemma matchunfoldActs [simp] : "finite A ⟹ match (Acts A) p = (∃t. p = [t] ∧ action t ∈ A)"
  by (simp add: Acts_def; rule someI2_ex; simp add: finite_list)

text ‹Defining notions of occurrence.
A set of actions ‹A› occurs on path ‹p› if and only if there exists an action in A 
that occurs along the path.›

fun alloccurringmap :: "(('s × 'a × 's) ⇒ 'b) ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ 'b set" where
"alloccurringmap f (fin p) = set (map f p)" |
"alloccurringmap f (inf p) = image f (range p)"

abbreviation alloccurringstates :: "'s ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ 's set" where
"alloccurringstates s p ≡ insert s (alloccurringmap target p)"

abbreviation alloccurringactions :: "('a, 's) path ⇒ 'a set" where
"alloccurringactions p ≡ alloccurringmap action p"

definition occurs :: "'a set ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"occurs A p ≡ (∃ a ∈ A. a ∈ alloccurringactions p)"

lemma occurssimps [simp] : 
  shows "occurs A (fin p) = (∃ a ∈ A. a ∈ set (map action p))"
  and "occurs A (inf p') = (∃ a ∈ A. a ∈ image action (range p'))"
  by (simp_all add: occurs_def)

lemma alloccursnotoccurs : "alloccurringactions p ⊆ A = (¬occurs (-A) p)"
  unfolding occurs_def by auto

lemma occurs_map_exists_fin : "a ∈ set (map f p) = (∃n < length p. f (p!n) = a)"
  apply (simp add: image_iff)
  using in_set_conv_nth apply metis
  done

text ‹A finite path matches ‹Star (Acts A)› (A Kleene star) if and only if 
  all its actions are in ‹A›.›

lemma matchstaract : "finite A ⟹ match (Acts A⇧⋆) p = (alloccurringactions (fin p) ⊆ A)"
  apply (induct p; simp add: matchstar_eq_matchntimes)
  apply (subgoal_tac "matchntimes 0 (Acts A) []")
  apply blast
  apply (simp)
proof
  fix t 
  fix p :: "('a, 's) finpath"
  assume assum1: "(∃n. matchntimes n (Acts A) p) = (action ` set p ⊆ A)"
  assume assum2 : "finite A"
  assume "∃n. matchntimes n (Acts A) (t # p)"
  then obtain n where "matchntimes n (Acts A) (t # p)" by auto
  thus "action t ∈ A ∧ action ` set p ⊆ A" 
    apply (induct n)
    using assum1 assum2 apply auto
    done
next
  fix t :: "'s × 'a × 's" 
  fix p :: "('a, 's) finpath"
  assume "(∃n. matchntimes n (Acts A) p) = (action ` set p ⊆ A)"
  then obtain n where assum1: "matchntimes n (Acts A) p = (action ` set p ⊆ A)" by auto
  assume assum2: "finite A"
  assume "action t ∈ A ∧ action ` set p ⊆ A"
  hence "t # p = [t] @ p ∧ action t ∈ A ∧ matchntimes n (Acts A) p" using assum1 by simp
  hence "matchntimes (Suc n) (Acts A) (t # p)" unfolding matchntimes.simps using matchunfoldActs assum2 by blast
  thus "∃n. matchntimes n (Acts A) (t # p)" by blast
qed

text ‹Defining operations on paths and some simplifications for these operations.›

fun pref :: "nat ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath" where 
"pref i (fin p) = take i p" |
"pref i (inf p) = prefix i p"

fun suff :: "nat ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ ('a, 's) path" where 
"suff i (fin p) = fin (drop i p)" |
"suff i (inf p) = inf (suffix i p)"

fun ind :: "nat ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ ('s × 'a × 's)" where
"ind i (fin p) = p!i" |
"ind i (inf p) = p i"

lemma emptylist [simp] : "(pref i p = []) = (i = 0 ∨ p = fin [])"
  using take_eq_Nil by (cases p) simp_all

lemma nosuffix [simp] : "(p = fin [] ∨ i = 0) ⟹ (suff i p = p)"
  by (cases p; auto)

fun indicespath :: "('a, 's) path ⇒ nat set" where
"indicespath (fin p) = ({n. n < length p})" |
"indicespath (inf p) = UNIV"

fun laststate :: "'s ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath ⇒ 's" where
"laststate s [] = s" |
"laststate s p = target (last p)"

lemma laststatesimps:
  shows "p = [] ⟹ laststate s (t # p) = target t "
  and "p ≠ [] ⟹ laststate s (t # p) = laststate s' p"
  apply simp
  apply (induct p; simp)
  done

lemma laststate_conc [simp]: "laststate s (p @ p') = laststate (laststate s p) p'" 
  by (induct p; induct p'; simp add: laststatesimps)

lemma laststatetarget [simp]:
  shows "laststate s (t # p) = laststate (target t) p"
  by (cases p; simp)

lemma validfinpathlaststate : "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ laststate s p = s'"
  by (induct p arbitrary: s, simp, simp del: laststate.simps)

lemma validfinpathuniquelaststate : "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ validfinpath M s p s'' ⟹ s' = s''"
  by (induct p arbitrary : s; auto)

lemma prefleft : "n ∈ indicespath p ⟹ (pref (Suc n) p) = (ind 0 p) # (pref n (suff (Suc 0) p))"
  by (cases p; induct n; simp add: take_Suc_conv_app_nth)

text ‹Simplifications for valid paths, in particular on extensions and subpaths.›

lemma validfinpathsplit [simp] : "validfinpath M s (p @ p') s' = (∃s''. validfinpath M s p s'' ∧ validfinpath M s'' p' s')"
  by (induct p arbitrary: s; simp)

lemma shiftinfvalidpath [simp]: "validinfpath M s (t ## p) = (s = source t ∧ t ∈ transition M ∧ validinfpath M (target t) p)"
proof-
  have "(∀n. (n = 0 ⟶ t ∈ transition M ∧ target t = source (p 0)) ∧ (0 < n ⟶ p (n - Suc 0) ∈ transition M ∧ target (p (n - Suc 0)) = source (p n))) =
    (t ∈ transition M ∧ target t = source (p 0) ∧ (∀n. (0 < n ⟶ p (n - Suc 0) ∈ transition M ∧ target (p (n - Suc 0)) = source (p n))))" by auto
  moreover have "... = (t ∈ transition M ∧ target t =  source (p 0) ∧ (∀n. p n ∈ transition M ∧ target (p n) = source (p (Suc n))))" by auto
  ultimately have "(validinfpath M s (conc [t] p)) = (s = source t ∧ t ∈ transition M ∧ validinfpath M (target t) p)" by (simp add: validinfpath_def conc_def)
  thus ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma validinfpathsplit [simp] : "validinfpath M s (conc p p') = (∃s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ validinfpath M s' p')"
  by (induct p arbitrary: s; simp)

lemma validinfpathsplitlaststate : "(validfinpath M s p (laststate s p) ∧ validinfpath M (laststate s p) p') = validinfpath M s (conc p p')"
  using validinfpathsplit validfinpathlaststate by metis

lemma validfinsubpath [simp] : "i < length p ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ validfinpath M s (take i p) (source (p!i))"
  apply (induct p arbitrary: s i, simp)
proof-
  case Cons
  then show ?case by (cases i; auto)
qed

lemma validfinpathtakelaststate : "n < length p ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ laststate s (take n p) = source (p!n)"
  using validfinpathlaststate validfinsubpath by meson

lemma validfinsubpathtarget [simp] : "i < length p ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ validfinpath M s (take (Suc i) p) (target (p!i))"
  apply (induct p arbitrary: s i, simp)
proof-
  case Cons
  then show ?case by (cases i; auto)
qed

lemma validfinsubpathright [simp] : "i < length p ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ validfinpath M (source (p!i)) (drop i p) s'"
  apply (induct p arbitrary: s i, simp)
proof-
  case Cons
  then show ?case by (cases i; auto)
qed

lemma validfinsubpathtargetright [simp] : "i < length p ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ validfinpath M (target (p!i)) (drop (Suc i) p) s'"
  apply (induct p arbitrary: s i, simp)
proof-
  case Cons
  then show ?case by (cases i; auto)
qed
 
lemma validinfsubpath [simp] : "validinfpath M s p ⟹ validfinpath M s (prefix i p) (source (p i))"
  by (induct i arbitrary : s p; simp add: validinfpath_def)

lemma validinfpathprefixlaststate : "validinfpath M s p ⟹ laststate s (prefix n p) = source (p n)"
  using validfinpathlaststate validinfsubpath by meson

lemma validinfsubpathright [simp] : "validinfpath M s p ⟹ validinfpath M (source (p i)) (suffix i p)"
  by (induct i; simp add: validinfpath_def)

lemma validinfsubpathtargetright [simp] : "validinfpath M s p ⟹ validinfpath M (target (p i)) (suffix (Suc i) p)"
  by (induct i; simp add: validinfpath_def)

lemma zerothtransitionfinpath : "0 < length p ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ (p!0 ∈ transition M)"
  by (induct p; simp)

text ‹The ‹i›'th transition in a valid path is in the transitions of the labeled transition system›

lemma ithtransitionfinpath [simp] : "i < length p ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ p!i ∈ transition M"
proof-
  assume assum1: "i < length p ∧ validfinpath M s p s'"
  hence "0 < length (drop i p) ∧ validfinpath M (source (p!i)) (drop i p) s'" by auto
  hence "(drop i p)!0 ∈ transition M" by (rule zerothtransitionfinpath)
  moreover have "(drop i p)!0 = p!i" using assum1 by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma validfinpathsource : "p ≠ [] ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟶ s = source (p!0)"
  by (induct p arbitrary : s; simp)

lemma zerothtargetsourcefinpath : "Suc 0 < length p ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ target (p!0) = source (p!(Suc 0))"
  by (induct p; auto simp : validfinpathsource)

lemma ithtargetsourcefinpath [simp] : "Suc i < length p ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ target (p!i) = source (p!(Suc i))"
proof-
  assume assum1: "Suc i < length p ∧ validfinpath M s p s'"
  hence "Suc 0 < length (drop i p) ∧ validfinpath M (source (p!i)) (drop i p) s'" by auto
  hence "target ((drop i p)!0) = source ((drop i p)!(Suc 0))" by (rule zerothtargetsourcefinpath)
  moreover have "(drop i p)!0 = p!i ∧ (drop i p)!(Suc 0) = p!(Suc i)" using assum1 by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

text ‹Some recurring formulas and simplifications.›

lemma Boxcomplement_locked : "finite (-B) ⟹ s ∈ ⟦[Acts (-B)]⇩R ff⟧ M e = locked M B s"
  by (simp add: locked_def del: Box.simps; auto)

lemma Diamond_enabled : "finite (α⇩e) ⟹ s ∈ ⟦⟨Acts α⇩e⟩⇩R tt⟧ M e = enabled M s α⇩e"
  by (simp del: Diamond.simps; auto simp: enabled_def)

lemma finitesubsetUNIV [simp] : "finite (UNIV :: 'a set) ⟹ finite (A :: 'a set)"
  using finite_subset subset_UNIV by blast

lemma validfinpathmatchacts [simp] : "finite A ⟹ (validfinpath M s p s' ∧ match (Acts A) p) = (∃a ∈ A. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M ∧ p = [(s, a, s')])"
  by auto

lemma Diamondactsempty [simp] : "finite A ⟹ ⟦f⟧ M e = {} ⟹ ⟦⟨Acts A⟩⇩R f⟧ M e = {}"
  by simp

lemma Diamondempty [simp] : "⟦f⟧ M e = {} ⟹ ⟦⟨R⟩⇩R f⟧ M e = {}"
  by (induct R arbitrary : f e; auto)

lemma Diamondmatch :
  "s ∈ ⟦⟨R⟩⇩R f⟧ M e = (∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ match R p ∧ s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e)"
  apply (induct R arbitrary : f s e)
  apply simp+
  apply force
  apply simp
  apply blast
  apply simp
proof-
  fix R Q f s e
  have "(∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ match R p ∧ (∃p s''. validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ match Q p ∧ s'' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e)) = (∃p p' s''. (∃s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ validfinpath M s' p' s'') ∧ match R p ∧ match Q p' ∧ s'' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e)" by blast
  moreover have "... = (∃p p' s''. validfinpath M s (p @ p') s'' ∧ match R p ∧ match Q p' ∧ s'' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e)" by simp
  ultimately show "(∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ match R p ∧ (∃p s''. validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ match Q p ∧ s'' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e)) = (∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ (∃p' p''. p = p' @ p'' ∧ match R p' ∧ match Q p'') ∧ s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e)" by blast
next
  fix f s e
  case IH: (Star R)
  show ?case
    apply (rule iffI)
  proof-
    let ?S' = "{s. ∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ match (Star R) p ∧ s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e}"
    have "⋀s. s ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e ⟹ validfinpath M s [] s ∧ match (Star R) [] ∧ s ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e" unfolding match_def by auto
    hence "⟦f⟧ M e ⊆ ?S'" by blast
    moreover {
      fix s 
      assume "s ∈ ⟦Diamond R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e ?S')"
      from this IH obtain p s' p' s'' where "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ match R p ∧ validfinpath M s' p' s'' ∧ match (Star R) p' ∧ s'' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e" by auto
      hence "validfinpath M s (p @ p') s'' ∧ match (Star R) (p @ p') ∧ s'' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e" unfolding match_def by auto
      hence "s ∈ ?S'" by blast
    }
    ultimately have "⟦Diamond R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e ?S') ∪ ⟦f⟧ M e ⊆ ?S'" by blast
    moreover assume "s ∈ ⟦Diamond (Star R) f⟧ M e"
    ultimately show "∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ match (Star R) p ∧ s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e" by auto
  next
    assume "∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ match (Star R) p ∧ s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e"
    then obtain p s' n where assum1: "validfinpath M s p s' ∧  matchntimes n R p ∧ s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e" by (auto simp: matchstar_eq_matchntimes)
    show "s ∈ ⟦Diamond (Star R) f⟧ M e"
      apply simp
      apply (rule allI impI)+
    proof-
      fix S'
      assume assum2 : "⟦Diamond R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e S') ⊆ S' ∧ ⟦f⟧ M e ⊆ S'"
      have "(s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e ∧ matchntimes n R p ∧ validfinpath M s p s') ⟹ s ∈ S'"
        apply (induct n arbitrary: s p; simp)
        using assum1 assum2 apply blast
      proof-
        fix n s p
        assume assum3 : "(⋀s p. matchntimes n R p ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ s ∈ S')"
        assume "s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e ∧ (∃p' p''. p = p' @ p'' ∧ match R p' ∧ matchntimes n R p'') ∧ validfinpath M s p s'"
        then obtain p' p'' s'' where "s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e ∧  match R p' ∧ matchntimes n R p'' ∧ validfinpath M s p' s'' ∧ validfinpath M s'' p'' s'"  using validfinpathsplit by metis
        hence "s ∈ ⟦Diamond R (var 0)⟧ M (newenvironment e S')" using assum3 IH by auto
        thus "s ∈ S'" using assum2 by auto
      qed
      thus "s ∈ S'" using assum1 by auto
    qed
  qed
qed

text ‹For small examples (for which the formula holds in all states) 
  we do not have to use ‹Diamondmatch›; auto will solve the lemma.
  The absence of such paths is harder to prove.›

lemma example_Star: "⟦⟨{𝖻}⇩R⇧⋆ ⋅ {𝖺}⇩R⟩⇩R tt⟧ example_lts e = {s⇩0, s⇩1, s⇩2}"
  apply (rule subset_antisym)
  using example_states.exhaust apply blast
  apply (auto simp: example_lts_def)
  done

lemma Diamondor : "⟦⟨R⟩⇩R (f ∨⇩μ g)⟧ M e = ⟦⟨R⟩⇩R f ∨⇩μ ⟨R⟩⇩R g⟧ M e"
proof-
  have "⋀s. s ∈ ⟦Diamond R (or f g)⟧ M e = (s ∈ ⟦or (Diamond R f) (Diamond R g)⟧ M e)" by (auto simp: Diamondmatch)
  thus ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma Boxmatch : "s ∈ ⟦[R]⇩R f⟧ M e = (∀p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ match R p ⟶ s' ∈ ⟦f⟧ M e)"
proof-
  have "⟦Box R f⟧ M e = ⟦neg (Diamond R (neg f))⟧ M e" by (subst negDiamond; rule Box_eq; simp)
  moreover have "s ∈ ⟦Diamond R (neg f)⟧ M e = (∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ match R p ∧ s' ∉ ⟦f⟧ M e)" by (subst Diamondmatch; simp)
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed 

lemma Boxand : "⟦[R]⇩R (f ∧⇩μ g)⟧ M e = ⟦[R]⇩R f ∧⇩μ [R]⇩R g⟧ M e"
proof-
  have "⋀s. s ∈ ⟦Box R (and' f g)⟧ M e = (s ∈ ⟦and' (Box R f) (Box R g)⟧ M e)" by (auto simp: Boxmatch)
  thus ?thesis by auto
qed

text ‹Simplification rules for occurrence.›

lemma addpathsnotoccurs: "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ validfinpath M s' p' s'' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p') ⟹ validfinpath M s (p @ p') s'' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (p @ p'))"
  by auto

lemma alloccurringactionsfin : "alloccurringactions (fin p) = {action (p!n)| n. n < length p}"
proof-
  have "alloccurringactions (fin p) = {a. a ∈ set (map action p)}" by simp
  moreover have "... = {a. ∃n < length p. action (p!n) = a}" by (subst occurs_map_exists_fin; simp)
  ultimately show "alloccurringactions (fin p) = {action (p!n)| n. n < length p}" by auto
qed

lemma alloccurringactionsfinright : "alloccurringactions (fin (drop i p)) ⊆ alloccurringactions (fin p)" 
  unfolding alloccurringactionsfin by auto

lemma alloccurringactionsfinleft : "alloccurringactions (fin (take i p)) ⊆ alloccurringactions (fin p)" 
  unfolding alloccurringactionsfin by auto

lemma occurs_max_exists : "a ∈ set (map action p) ⟹ (∃n < length p. action (p!n) = a ∧ a ∉ alloccurringactions (fin (drop (Suc n) p)))"
proof-
  let ?n = "Max {n. n < length p ∧ action (p!n) = a}"
  assume "a ∈ set (map action p)"
  hence "∃n < length p. action (p!n) = a" using occurs_map_exists_fin by metis
  hence max_exists: "finite {n. n < length p ∧ action (p!n) = a} ∧ {n. n < length p ∧ action (p!n) = a} ≠ {}" by auto 
  hence "∀m. m < length p ∧ m > ?n ⟶ action (p!m) ≠ a" using Max_ge leD by blast
  moreover have "⋀n. (∀m. m < length p ∧ m > n ⟶ action (p!m) ≠ a) ⟹ (∀m < length (drop (Suc n) p). action ((drop (Suc n) p)!m) ≠ a)" by auto
  ultimately have "∀m < length (drop (Suc ?n) p). action ((drop (Suc ?n) p)!m) ≠ a" by blast
  hence "a ∉ alloccurringactions (fin (drop (Suc ?n) p))" unfolding alloccurringactionsfin by auto
  moreover have "?n < length p ∧ action (p!?n) = a" using max_exists Max_in by blast
  ultimately show "∃n < length p. action (p!n) = a ∧ a ∉ alloccurringactions (fin (drop (Suc n) p))" by auto
qed

lemma occursfinalternative : "occurs A (fin p) = (∃n < length p. action (p!n) ∈ A)"
  unfolding occurssimps alloccurringmap.simps using occurs_map_exists_fin by metis

lemma occursinfalternative : "occurs A (inf p) = (∃ n. action (p n) ∈ A)"
  by auto

lemma notoccursempty: "¬occurs {} (fin p)" 
  by (simp add: occurs_def)

lemma alloccurringstatesalternative : "alloccurringstates s p = insert s {target (ind i p) | i. i ∈ indicespath p}"
  apply (cases p; auto)
  using in_set_conv_nth sourceactiontargetsimp(3) apply metis
  done

lemma alloccurringstatesinset : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀n ∈ indicespath p. target (ind n p) ∈ S') ⟹ alloccurringstates s p ⊆ S'"
  unfolding alloccurringstatesalternative by auto

lemma sourcetargetfin : "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ insert s (set (map target p)) = insert s' (set (map source p))"
  by (induct p arbitrary: s; auto) 

lemma laststateoccurs: "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ s' ∈ alloccurringstates s (fin p)"
  unfolding alloccurringmap.simps by (subst sourcetargetfin; auto)

definition occursstate :: "'s set ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"occursstate S' s p ≡ (∃s' ∈ S'. s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p)"

lemma occursstatesimps [simp] : 
  shows "occursstate S' s (fin p) = (∃ s' ∈ S'. s' ∈ insert s (set (map target p)))" 
  and "occursstate S' s (inf p') = (∃ s' ∈ S'. s' ∈ insert s (image target (range p')))"
  by (simp_all add: occursstate_def)

lemma occursstatealternative : "occursstate S' s p = (s ∈ S' ∨ (∃ n ∈ indicespath p. target (ind n p) ∈ S'))"
  apply (cases p; simp add: image_iff)
  using in_set_conv_nth apply metis
  apply auto
  done

lemma notemptypath : "s ∉ S' ∧ (occursstate S' s (fin p) ∨ occurs A (fin p)) ⟶ p ≠ []" 
  by (cases p; simp)

lemma notoccursendpath : "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occursstate S' s (fin p) ⟹ s' ∉ S'"
proof-
  assume "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occursstate S' s (fin p)"
  hence "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬(∃s'∈S'. s' ∈ insert s (set (map target p)))" by simp
  hence "∀ s'' ∈ S'. s'' ∉ insert s' (set (map source p))" using sourcetargetfin by metis
  thus ?thesis by auto
qed

text ‹Defining completeness criteria.›

fun progressing :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"progressing M B s (fin p) = locked M B (laststate s p)" |
"progressing M B s (inf p) = True"

definition perpetuallyenabled :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ 'a set" where
"perpetuallyenabled M s p = {a . (∀s ∈ alloccurringstates s p. a ∈ enabledactions M s)}"

lemma perpetuallyenabled_alternative: "perpetuallyenabled M s p = enabledactionsset M (alloccurringstates s p)"
  by (simp add: enabledactionsset_def perpetuallyenabled_def)

definition allsuffixes :: "'s ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ ('s ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool) ⇒ bool" where
"allsuffixes s p P = (P s p ∧ (∀i ∈ indicespath p. P (target (ind i p)) (suff (Suc i) p)))"

definition relentlesslyenabled :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ 'a set" where
"relentlesslyenabled M s p = {a . allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s ∈ alloccurringstates s p. a ∈ enabledactions M s)}"

definition reachableactionsset :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's set ⇒ 'a set" where
"reachableactionsset M B S' = {a. ∀s ∈ S'. ∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs B (fin p) ∧ a ∈ enabledactions M s'}"

lemma reachableactionsstatessubset : "A' ⊆ A ⟹ reachableactionsset M B A ⊆ reachableactionsset M B A'"
  by (auto simp: reachableactionsset_def)

lemma reachableactionssubset : "B' ⊆ B ⟹ reachableactionsset M B S' ⊆ reachableactionsset M B' S'"
  unfolding reachableactionsset_def occurs_def by blast

definition reachableactions :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ 'a set" where
"reachableactions M B s = reachableactionsset M B {s}"

lemma reachableactionsdef : "reachableactions M B s = {a. ∃p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs B (fin p) ∧ a ∈ enabledactions M s'}"
  by (simp add: reachableactions_def reachableactionsset_def)

lemma enabled_reachable : "enabledactions M s ⊆ reachableactions M B s"
  unfolding enabledactions_def reachableactions_def reachableactionsset_def
  by (subgoal_tac "validfinpath M s [] s ∧ ¬occurs B (fin [])"; (blast|simp))

lemma Diamondreachable : "finite (-B) ⟹ s ∈ ⟦⟨Acts (-B)⇧⋆⟩⇩R ⟨a⟩⇩μtt⟧ M e = (a ∈ reachableactions M B s)"
  by (simp only: Diamondmatch matchstaract reachableactionsdef, auto)

lemma Boxnotreachable : "finite (-B) ⟹ s ∈ ⟦[Acts (-B)⇧⋆]⇩R [a]⇩μff⟧ M e = (a ∉ reachableactions M B s)"
  by (simp only: Boxmatch matchstaract reachableactionsdef, auto)

definition perpetuallyreachable :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒'s ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ 'a set" where
"perpetuallyreachable M B s p = {a . (∀s ∈ alloccurringstates s p. a ∈ reachableactions M B s)}"

lemma perpetuallyenabled_perpetuallyreachable : "perpetuallyenabled M s p ⊆ perpetuallyreachable M B s p"
  unfolding perpetuallyenabled_def perpetuallyreachable_def using enabled_reachable by fastforce

lemma perpetuallyenabled_relentlesslyenabled : "perpetuallyenabled M s p ⊆ relentlesslyenabled M s p"
  by (auto simp: relentlesslyenabled_def perpetuallyenabled_alternative enabledactionsset_def allsuffixes_def alloccurringstatesalternative)

definition relentlesslyreachable :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ 'a set" where
"relentlesslyreachable M B s p = {a . allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s ∈ alloccurringstates s p. a ∈ reachableactions M B s)}"

lemma relentlesslyenabled_relentlesslyreachable: "relentlesslyenabled M s p ⊆ relentlesslyreachable M B s p"
  unfolding relentlesslyenabled_def relentlesslyreachable_def allsuffixes_def using enabled_reachable by fastforce

definition WFA :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"WFA M B s p = allsuffixes s p (λs p. perpetuallyenabled M s p -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p)"

abbreviation preimagerelation :: "('a ⇒ 'a ⇒ bool) ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 'a set" where 
"preimagerelation A A' ≡ {a. ∀a' ∈ A'. A a a'}"

definition concurrency :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ ('a ⇒ 'a ⇒ bool) ⇒ bool" where
"concurrency M con = (irreflp con ∧ (∀p s s'. validfinpath M s p s' ⟶ (enabledactions M s ∩ preimagerelation con (alloccurringactions (fin p)) ⊆ enabledactions M s')))"

definition JA :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ ('a ⇒ 'a ⇒ bool) ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"JA M con B s p = allsuffixes s p (λs p. (∀a ∈ enabledactions M s -B. (∃a'. ¬con a a' ∧ a' ∈ alloccurringactions p)))"

definition WHFA :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"WHFA M B s p = allsuffixes s p (λs p. perpetuallyreachable M B s p -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p)"

definition SFA :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"SFA M B s p = allsuffixes s p (λs p. relentlesslyenabled M s p -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p)"

definition SHFA :: "('a, 's) lts ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 's ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ bool" where
"SHFA M B s p = allsuffixes s p (λs p. relentlesslyreachable M B s p -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p)"

lemma WHFA_WFA : "WHFA M B s p ⟹ WFA M B s p"
  unfolding WFA_def WHFA_def allsuffixes_def
  using perpetuallyenabled_perpetuallyreachable by fastforce

lemma SFA_WFA : "SFA M B s p ⟹ WFA M B s p"
  unfolding SFA_def WFA_def allsuffixes_def
  using perpetuallyenabled_relentlesslyenabled by fastforce

lemma SHFA_SFA : "SHFA M B s p ⟹ SFA M B s p"
  unfolding SFA_def SHFA_def allsuffixes_def using relentlesslyenabled_relentlesslyreachable by fastforce

text ‹Defining the extension of a finite path.›

fun extendfinpath :: "('a, 's) finpath ⇒ ('a, 's) path ⇒ ('a, 's) path" where
"extendfinpath p (fin p') = fin (p @ p')" |
"extendfinpath p (inf p') = inf (conc p p')"

lemma extendfinpath_pref_suff : "p = extendfinpath (pref i p) (suff i p)"
  by (cases p; simp)

lemma extendfinpath_extendfinpath [simp] : "extendfinpath (p @ p') p'' = extendfinpath p (extendfinpath p' p'')"
  by (cases p''; simp)

lemma extendfinemptypath [simp] : "extendfinpath [] p = p"
  by (cases p; simp)

lemma extendfinpath_ind [simp] : "i < length p ⟹ ind i (extendfinpath p p') = p ! i" 
  by (cases p'; simp add: nth_append_left)

lemma extendfinpath_ind_right [simp] : "i ≥ length p ⟹ ind i (extendfinpath p p') = ind (i - length p) p'" 
  by (cases p'; simp add: nth_append_right)

lemma extendfinpath_pref [simp] : "i ≤ length p ⟹ pref i (extendfinpath p p') = take i p" 
  by (cases p'; simp)

lemma extendfinpath_pref_right [simp] : "i > length p ⟹ pref i (extendfinpath p p') = p @ pref (i - length p) p'" 
  by (cases p'; simp)

lemma extendfinpath_suff [simp] : "i < length p ⟹ suff i (extendfinpath p p') = extendfinpath (drop i p) p'" 
  by (cases p'; simp)

lemma extendfinpath_suff_right [simp] : "i ≥ length p ⟹ suff i (extendfinpath p p') = suff (i - length p) p'" 
  by (cases p'; simp)

lemma validpathsplit: "validpath M s (extendfinpath p p') = (∃s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ validpath M s' p')"
  using validfinpathsplit by (cases p'; simp; metis)

lemma occursleft : "occurs S' (fin p) ⟹ occurs S' (extendfinpath p p')"
  by (cases p'; auto)

lemma occursright : "occurs S' p' ⟹ occurs S' (extendfinpath p p')"
  by (cases p'; auto)

lemma occursfinleft : "occurs S' (fin (take i p)) ⟹ occurs S' (fin p)"
  by (simp only: occursfinalternative, auto)

lemma notoccursfinright : "¬occurs S' (fin p) ⟹ ¬occurs S' (fin (drop i p))"
  by (simp only: occursfinalternative; simp)

lemma occursfinright : "occurs S' (fin (drop i p)) ⟹ occurs S' (fin p)"
  using notoccursfinright by blast

lemma occursstateleft: "occursstate S' s (fin p) ⟹ (occursstate S' s (extendfinpath p p'))"
  by (cases p'; auto)

lemma alloccurringstatesright: "alloccurringstates (laststate s p) p' ⊆ alloccurringstates s (extendfinpath p p')"
  by (cases p'; induct p; auto)

lemma occursstateright : "occursstate S' (laststate s p) p' ⟹ occursstate S' s (extendfinpath p p')"
  unfolding occursstate_def using alloccurringstatesright insert_absorb insert_subset by metis

lemma occursleftorright :
  assumes "occurs A (fin p) ∨ occursstate S' s (fin p) ∨ occurs A p' ∨ occursstate S' (laststate s p) p'"
  shows "occurs A (extendfinpath p p') ∨ occursstate S' s (extendfinpath p p')" 
  using assms occursleft occursright occursstateleft occursstateright by metis
                                                      
lemma occursstaterightvalidpath : "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ occursstate S' s' p' ⟹ occursstate S' s (extendfinpath p p')"
  using occursstateright validfinpathlaststate by metis

lemma occursempty : "occurs A (fin p) ⟹ p ≠ []"
  by (cases p; simp)

lemma occursstateempty : "occursstate S' s (fin p) ∧ s ∉ S' ⟹ p ≠ []"
  by (cases p; simp)

lemma allnextstatesnotlocked: 
  assumes "S' = {s. ∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ P s'}"
  and "s ∈ S'"
  and "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p)"
  shows "alloccurringstates s (fin p) ⊆ S'"
  unfolding alloccurringstatesalternative
  apply rule
  using assms(2) apply auto
proof (rule ccontr)
  fix i
  assume "i < length p"
  hence validsubpath: "validfinpath M s (take (Suc i) p) (target (p!i)) ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (take (Suc i) p))" using assms(3) validfinsubpathtarget occursfinleft by metis
  assume "target (p ! i) ∉ S'"
  then obtain p' s'' where "validfinpath M (target (p ! i)) p' s'' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p') ∧ P s''" using assms(1) by auto
  hence "validfinpath M s (take (Suc i) p @ p') s'' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (take (Suc i) p @ p')) ∧ P s''" using validsubpath by auto
  thus "False" using assms(1, 2) by blast
qed

lemma notlockedoccurs : "s ∈ {s. ∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ P s'} ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p) ⟹ s' ∈ {s. ∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ P s'}"
proof-
  assume assum1: "s ∈ {s. ∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ P s'} ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p)"
  hence "alloccurringstates s (fin p) ⊆ {s. ∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∧ P s'}" by (subst allnextstatesnotlocked[of _ M α⇩f P]; blast)
  moreover have "s' ∈ alloccurringstates s (fin p)" using assum1 laststateoccurs by metis
  ultimately show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma notlocked : "s ∈ {s. ∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ P s'} ∧ validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ s' ∈ {s. ∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ P s'}"
  by (insert notlockedoccurs[of s M "{}" P]; auto)

lemma occurringactionssubpath : "alloccurringactions p' ⊆ alloccurringactions (extendfinpath p p')"
  by (cases p'; induct p; auto)

lemma enabledactionssubset : "B ⊆ A ⟹ enabledactionsset M A ⊆ enabledactionsset M B"
  by (auto simp: enabledactionsset_def)

lemma enabledactionsset_subpath: "laststate s p = s' ⟹ enabledactionsset M (alloccurringstates s (extendfinpath p p')) ⊆ enabledactionsset M (alloccurringstates s' p')"
  using alloccurringstatesright enabledactionssubset by meson

lemma reachableactionsset_subpath: "laststate s p = s' ⟹ reachableactionsset M B (alloccurringstates s (extendfinpath p p')) ⊆ reachableactionsset M B (alloccurringstates s' p')"
  using alloccurringstatesright reachableactionsstatessubset by meson

text ‹Simplification rules for ‹allsuffixes›.›

lemma allsuffixes_validinfpath : "validinfpath M s p ⟹ allsuffixes s (inf p) P = (∀i. P (source (p i)) (inf (suffix i p)))"
  apply (auto simp: allsuffixes_def validinfpath_def)
  using not0_implies_Suc suffix_0 apply metis
  using suffix_0 apply metis
  done

lemma suffixallsuffixesinf: "validinfpath M s p ∧ allsuffixes s (inf p) P ⟹ allsuffixes (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) P"
  unfolding allsuffixes_def by (cases n; simp add: validinfpath_def; auto)

lemma allsuffixesfinempty [simp] : "allsuffixes s (fin []) P = P s (fin [])" by (simp add: allsuffixes_def)

lemma allsuffixes_extendfinpath [simp] : "allsuffixes s (extendfinpath [t] p) P = (P s (extendfinpath [t] p) ∧ allsuffixes (target t) p P)" 
  apply (simp add: allsuffixes_def)
proof-
  have predextend: "⋀Q. (∀i∈indicespath (extendfinpath [t] p). i > 0 ⟶ Q i) = (∀i∈indicespath p. Q (Suc i))" using gr0_conv_Suc by (cases p; auto)
  have "0 ∈ indicespath (extendfinpath [t] p)" by (cases p; simp)
  hence "(∀i∈indicespath (extendfinpath [t] p). P (target (ind i (extendfinpath [t] p))) (suff (Suc i) (extendfinpath [t] p))) = (P (target (ind 0 (extendfinpath [t] p))) (suff (Suc 0) (extendfinpath [t] p)) ∧ (∀i∈indicespath (extendfinpath [t] p). i > 0 ⟶ P (target (ind i (extendfinpath [t] p))) (suff (Suc i) (extendfinpath [t] p))))" using bot_nat_0.not_eq_extremum by blast
  moreover have "... = (P (target t) p ∧ (∀i∈indicespath (extendfinpath [t] p). i > 0 ⟶ P (target (ind i (extendfinpath [t] p))) (suff (Suc i) (extendfinpath [t] p))))" by simp
  ultimately show "(P s (extendfinpath [t] p) ∧ (∀i∈indicespath (extendfinpath [t] p). P (target (ind i (extendfinpath [t] p))) (suff i p))) = (P s (extendfinpath [t] p) ∧ P (target t) p ∧ (∀i∈indicespath p. P (target (ind i p)) (suff (Suc i) p)))" using predextend by auto
qed

lemma allsuffixes_extendpath: "allsuffixes s (extendfinpath p p') P ⟹ allsuffixes (laststate s p)  p' P"
  apply (induct p arbitrary: s)
  apply simp
proof-
  fix t p s
  assume IH : "⋀s. allsuffixes s (extendfinpath p p') P ⟹ allsuffixes (laststate s p) p' P"
  assume "allsuffixes s (extendfinpath (t # p) p') P"
  hence "allsuffixes s (extendfinpath [t] (extendfinpath p p')) P" by (cases p'; auto)
  hence "allsuffixes (target t) (extendfinpath p p') P" by simp
  thus "allsuffixes (laststate s (t # p)) p' P" using IH laststatetarget by metis
qed

lemma allsuffixes_extendpath_valid: "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ allsuffixes s (extendfinpath p p') P ⟹ allsuffixes s' p' P"
  using allsuffixes_extendpath validfinpathlaststate by metis

lemma allsuffixes_extendpath_iff: 
  assumes "⋀t p. t ∈ transition M ∧ allsuffixes (target t) p P ⟹ P (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p)" 
  shows "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ allsuffixes s (extendfinpath p p') P = allsuffixes s' p' P"
  apply (rule iffI)
  using allsuffixes_extendpath_valid apply metis
  apply (induct p arbitrary: s)
  apply simp
proof-
  fix t p s
  assume IH: "⋀s. validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ allsuffixes s' p' P ⟹ allsuffixes s (extendfinpath p p') P"
  assume "validfinpath M s (t # p) s'"
  moreover assume "allsuffixes s' p' P"
  ultimately have "s = source t ∧ t ∈ transition M ∧ allsuffixes (target t) (extendfinpath p p') P" using IH by simp
  moreover from this have "P s (extendfinpath [t] (extendfinpath p p'))" using assms by simp
  ultimately have "allsuffixes s (extendfinpath [t] (extendfinpath p p')) P" by simp
  thus "allsuffixes s (extendfinpath (t # p) p') P" by (cases p'; auto)
qed

lemma validfinpath_allsuffixes_empty: 
  assumes "⋀t p. t ∈ transition M ∧ allsuffixes (target t) p P ⟹ P (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p)" 
  shows "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ allsuffixes s (fin p) P = P s' (fin [])"
proof-
  assume "validfinpath M s p s'"
  hence "allsuffixes s (extendfinpath p (fin [])) P = P s' (fin [])" by (subst allsuffixes_extendpath_iff; simp add: assms)
  thus ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma P_extendpath:
  assumes "⋀t p. t ∈ transition M ∧ validpath M (target t) p ⟹ P (source t) (extendfinpath [t] p) = P (target t) p" 
  shows "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ validpath M s' p' ⟹ P s (extendfinpath p p') =  P s' p'"
  apply (induct p arbitrary: s)
  apply simp
proof-
  fix t p s
  assume IH: "(⋀s. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ validpath M s' p' ⟹ P s (extendfinpath p p') = P s' p')"
  have "extendfinpath (t # p) p' = extendfinpath ([t] @ p) p'" by simp
  moreover have "... = extendfinpath [t] (extendfinpath p p')" using extendfinpath_extendfinpath by metis
  moreover assume "validfinpath M s (t # p) s' ∧ validpath M s' p'"
  ultimately show "P s (extendfinpath (t # p) p') = P s' p'" using IH assms validfinpath.simps(2) validpathsplit by metis
qed

lemma P_extendpath_notvalid:
  assumes "⋀s t p. P s (extendfinpath [t] p) = P (target t) p" 
  shows "P s (extendfinpath p p') = P (laststate s p) p'"
  apply (induct p arbitrary: s)
  apply simp
proof-
  fix t p s
  assume IH: "(⋀s. P s (extendfinpath p p') = P (laststate s p) p')"
  have "extendfinpath (t # p) p' = extendfinpath ([t] @ p) p'" by simp
  moreover have "... = extendfinpath [t] (extendfinpath p p')" using extendfinpath_extendfinpath by metis
  moreover have "laststate s (t # p) = laststate (target t) p" by (simp only: laststatetarget)
  ultimately show "P s (extendfinpath (t # p) p') = P (laststate s (t # p)) p'" using IH assms by metis
qed

text ‹Continuing example of syntaxsemantics, giving a valid infinite path (from initial state)
  that satisfies ‹B›-WFA if and only if action ‹𝖻› is in ‹B›.›

lemma example_inf_path : "validinfpath example_lts s⇩0 (λn. (s⇩0, 𝖼, s⇩0))"
  by (simp add: validinfpath_def example_lts_def)

lemma example_WFA : "WFA example_lts B s⇩0 (inf (λn. (s⇩0, 𝖼, s⇩0))) = (𝖻 ∈ B)"
  by (auto simp: WFA_def perpetuallyenabled_alternative allsuffixes_def example_lts_def)

lemma example_inf_path' : "validinfpath example_lts s⇩2 ([(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)]⇧ω)"
  apply (auto simp: validinfpath_def example_lts_def)
proof-
  fix n
  assume "[(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (n mod Suc (Suc 0)) ≠ (s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1)"
  hence "n mod 2 ≠ 0" using nth_Cons_0 numeral_2_eq_2 by metis
  hence "n mod 2 = 1" by simp
  thus "[(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (n mod Suc (Suc 0)) = (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)" by (simp add: numeral_2_eq_2)
next
  fix n :: "nat"
  have "(n mod 2 = 0) ∨ (n mod 2 = 1)" by auto
  thus "target ([(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (n mod Suc (Suc 0))) = source ([(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc n mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by (auto simp: numeral_2_eq_2 mod_Suc)
qed

(*contains lots of repetition due to lack of mod simplification rules*)
lemma example_WFA' : "WFA example_lts B s⇩2 (inf [(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)]⇧ω)"
  apply (auto simp: WFA_def allsuffixes_def example_lts_def perpetuallyenabled_def)
proof-
  have "𝖻 = action ([(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (0 mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by simp
  thus "𝖻 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (x mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by blast
  fix i
  have "∃x. Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0) = Suc 0" by presburger
  then obtain x where "Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0) = Suc 0" by auto
  hence "𝖼 = action ([(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by simp
  thus "𝖼 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by blast
  thus "𝖼 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by assumption
  have "∃x. Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0) = 0" by presburger
  then obtain x where "Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0) = 0" by metis
  hence "𝖻 = action ([(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by simp
  thus "𝖻 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by blast
  thus "𝖻 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by assumption
  thus "𝖻 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by assumption
next
  fix i
  have "∃x. Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0) = Suc 0" by presburger
  then obtain x where "Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0) = Suc 0" by blast
  moreover assume "∀x. ∃s'. target ([(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩0 ∨ target ([(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0))) = s⇩1 ∧ s' = s⇩1"
  ultimately have "target ([(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! Suc 0) = s⇩1" by metis
  thus "𝖺 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by simp
  thus "𝖺 ∈ action ` range (λx. [(s⇩2, 𝖻, s⇩1), (s⇩1, 𝖼, s⇩2)] ! (Suc (i + x) mod Suc (Suc 0)))" by assumption
qed

lemma WHFAempty : "WHFA M B s (fin []) = locked M B s" 
  apply (auto simp: WHFA_def locked_def perpetuallyreachable_def)
proof-
  fix a s'
  assume assum1: "reachableactions M B s ⊆ B"
  assume "(s, a, s') ∈ transition M"
  hence "validfinpath M s [] s ∧ ¬occurs B (fin []) ∧ (s, a, s') ∈ transition M" by simp
  hence "a ∈ reachableactions M B s" unfolding reachableactions_def reachableactionsset_def enabledactions_def by blast
  thus "a ∈ B" using assum1 by auto
next
  fix a
  assume assum1: "{a. ∃s'. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M} ⊆ B"
  assume "a ∈ reachableactions M B s" 
  then obtain p s' where "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs B (fin p) ∧ a ∈ enabledactions M s'" by (auto simp: reachableactions_def reachableactionsset_def)
  hence "∃s'. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M" 
    apply (induct p)
    apply simp
    using assum1 apply (subgoal_tac "(s, action aa, target aa) ∈ transition M ∧ action aa ∈ -B"; (blast|auto))
    done
  thus "a ∈ B" using assum1 by blast
qed

text ‹Simplification rules for generalization of SFA and SHFA.›

lemma relentlessly_pred_sub: 
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  shows "A s (extendfinpath [t] p) ⊆ A (target t) p"
proof
  fix a
  assume "a ∈ A s (extendfinpath [t] p)"
  hence "allsuffixes s (extendfinpath [t] p) (λs p. ∃s∈alloccurringstates s p. Q a s)" using assms by simp
  hence "allsuffixes (target t) p (λs p. ∃s∈alloccurringstates s p. Q a s)" by auto
  thus "a ∈ A (target t) p" using assms by simp
qed

lemma relentlessly_pred_super: 
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  shows "A (target t) p ⊆ A s (extendfinpath [t] p)"
proof
  fix a
  assume "a ∈ A (target t) p"
  hence "allsuffixes (target t) p (λs p. ∃s'∈alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')" using assms by simp
  moreover {
    from this obtain s' where "s' ∈ alloccurringstates (target t) p ∧ Q a s'" by (auto simp: allsuffixes_def)
    hence "∃s'∈alloccurringstates s (extendfinpath [t] p). Q a s'" using alloccurringstatesright laststatesimps(1) in_mono by metis
  }
  ultimately have "allsuffixes s (extendfinpath [t] p) (λs p. ∃s'∈alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')" by simp
  thus "a ∈ A s (extendfinpath [t] p)" using assms by simp
qed

lemma relentlessly_pred: 
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  shows "A s (extendfinpath [t] p) = A (target t) p "
  apply (rule subset_antisym)
  apply (rule relentlessly_pred_sub; simp add: assms)
  apply (rule relentlessly_pred_super; simp add: assms)
  done

lemma relentlessly_extendpath_pred: 
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  shows "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ A s (extendfinpath p p') = A s' p'"
proof-
  have "A s (extendfinpath p p') = A (laststate s p) p'" by (rule P_extendpath_notvalid [where ?P="A"]; (rule relentlessly_pred)?; simp add: assms)
  thus "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ A s (extendfinpath p p') = A s' p'" by (simp add: validfinpathlaststate) 
qed

lemma relentlessly_firststate :
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  shows  "A s (inf p) = A s' (inf p)"
proof-
  have "A s (inf p) = A s (extendfinpath [p 0] (inf (suffix (Suc 0) p)))" by simp
  moreover have "... = A (target (p 0)) (inf (suffix (Suc 0) p))" by (rule relentlessly_pred; simp add: assms)
  moreover have "A s' (extendfinpath [p 0] (inf (suffix (Suc 0) p))) = A (target (p 0)) (inf (suffix (Suc 0) p))" by (rule relentlessly_pred; simp add: assms)
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma relentlessly_infextendpath: 
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  shows "A s (inf (conc p p')) = A s' (inf p')"
  apply (induct p)
  apply (simp; rule relentlessly_firststate[where ?s=s]; simp add: assms)
proof-
  fix t :: "'a × 'b × 'a"
  fix p
  assume "A s (inf (conc p p')) = A s' (inf p')"
  moreover have "A s (inf (conc p p')) = A (target t) (inf (conc p p'))" by (rule relentlessly_firststate[where ?s=s]; simp add: assms)
  moreover have "A s (extendfinpath [t] (inf (conc p p'))) = A (target t) (inf (conc p p'))" by (rule relentlessly_pred; simp add: assms)
  ultimately show "A s (inf (conc (t # p) p')) = A s' (inf p')" by simp
qed

lemma relentlessly_subpath :
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  and "P = (λs p. allsuffixes s p (λs p. A s p -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p))"
  shows "P s (extendfinpath [t] p) = P (target t) p"
  apply (auto simp: assms(2))
proof-
  fix a
  assume assum1: "allsuffixes (target t) p (λs p. A s p -B⊆ alloccurringactions p)"
  assume "a ∈ A s (extendfinpath [t] p)"
  moreover assume "a ∉ B"
  moreover have "A s (extendfinpath [t] p) = A (target t) p" by (rule relentlessly_pred; simp add: assms)
  ultimately have "a ∈ A (target t) p -B" by simp
  hence "a ∈ alloccurringactions p" using assum1 by (auto simp: allsuffixes_def)
  thus "a ∈ alloccurringactions (extendfinpath [t] p)" using occurringactionssubpath subset_iff by meson
qed

lemma relentlessly_extendpath_laststate: 
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  and "P = (λs p. allsuffixes s p (λs p. A s p -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p))"
  shows "P (laststate s p) p' = P s (extendfinpath p p')"
proof-
  have "P s (extendfinpath p p') = P (laststate s p) p'" by (rule P_extendpath_notvalid; rule relentlessly_subpath; simp add: assms)
  thus ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma relentlessly_extendpath:
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  and "P = (λs p. allsuffixes s p (λs p. A s p -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p))"
  shows "validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ P s' p' = P s (extendfinpath p p')"
  using relentlessly_extendpath_laststate[OF assms] validfinpathlaststate by metis

lemma relentlessly_infpathsuffix:
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  and "P = (λs p. allsuffixes s p (λs p. A s p -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p))"
  shows "validinfpath M s p ⟹ P s (inf p) = P (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p))"
proof-
  assume "validinfpath M s p"
  hence "validfinpath M s (prefix n p) (source (p n)) ∧ inf p = extendfinpath (prefix n p) (inf (suffix n p))" by simp
  moreover have "P (laststate s (prefix n p)) (inf (suffix n p)) = P s (extendfinpath (prefix n p) (inf (suffix n p)))" by (rule relentlessly_extendpath_laststate; simp add: assms)
  ultimately show "P s (inf p) = P (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p))" using validfinpathlaststate by metis
qed

lemma lockednotreachable : "locked M B s ⟹ ∀a∈-B. a ∉ reachableactions M B s"
  apply rule+
proof-
  fix a
  assume locked: "locked M B s"
  assume Bcomp: "a ∈ -B"
  assume "a ∈ reachableactions M B s"
  then obtain p s' where validpath: "validfinpath M s p s' ∧ ¬occurs B (fin p) ∧ a ∈ enabledactions M s'" by (auto simp: reachableactions_def reachableactionsset_def)
  {
    assume "p = []"
    hence "a ∈ enabledactions M s" using validpath by auto
    hence False using locked Bcomp unfolding locked_def by blast
  }
  moreover {
    fix t p'
    assume "p = t # p'"
    hence "(source t, action t, target t) ∈ transition M ∧ action t ∉ B ∧ locked M B (source t)" using validpath locked by auto
    moreover from this have "∃s'. (source t, action t, s') ∈ transition M" by blast
    ultimately have "False" unfolding locked_def enabledactions_def by auto
  }
  ultimately show False by (cases p)
qed

lemma notreachable_locked: "(∀a∈-B. a ∉ reachableactions M B s) ⟹ locked M B s"
  unfolding locked_def apply (rule subsetI ballI)
proof-
  fix a
  assume assum1: "∀a∈-B. a ∉ reachableactions M B s"
  assume "a ∈ enabledactions M s"
  hence "a ∈ reachableactions M B s" using enabled_reachable subset_iff by metis
  thus "a ∈ B" using assum1 by auto
qed

lemma lockednotQ: 
  assumes "⋀s a. a ∈ -B ∧ Q a s ⟹ a ∈ reachableactions M B s"
  shows "a ∈ -B ∧ locked M B s ⟹ ¬Q a s" 
proof-
  fix a s
  assume "a ∈ -B ∧ locked M B s"
  hence "a ∈ -B ∧ a ∉ reachableactions M B s" by (simp add: lockednotreachable)
  thus "¬Q a s" using assms by auto
qed

lemma relentlesslyinvarfin : 
  assumes "⋀s a. a ∈ -B ∧ Q a s ⟹ a ∈ reachableactions M B s" 
  and "⋀s. (∀a ∈ -B. ¬Q a s) ⟹ locked M B s"
  and "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  and "P = (λs p. allsuffixes s p (λs p. A s p -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p))"
  shows "P s (fin []) = locked M B s"
  unfolding assms(3) assms(4) apply simp
proof-
  have "⋀s. (∀a ∈ -B. ¬Q a s) = ({a. Q a s} -B = {})" by auto
  thus "({a. Q a s} ⊆ B) = locked M B s" using lockednotQ[OF assms(1)] assms by auto
qed

lemma occuringstatessuffix : "alloccurringstates (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p)) ⊆ alloccurringstates s (inf p)"
  by auto

lemma image_subset_inf : "n ≤ m ⟹ image f (range (suffix m p)) ⊆ image f (range (suffix n p))"
  unfolding image_def apply auto
  using le_Suc_ex trans_le_add1 apply metis
  done

lemma image_subset_fin : "n ≤ m ⟹ image f (set (drop m p)) ⊆ image f (set (drop n p))"
  unfolding image_def apply auto
  using set_drop_subset_set_drop subset_iff apply metis
  done

lemma occuringstatessuffixsuffix [simp] : "n ≤ m ∧ target (p m) ∈ alloccurringstates (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p)) ⟹ alloccurringstates (target (p m)) (inf (suffix (Suc m) p)) ⊆ alloccurringstates (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p))"
proof-
  assume "n ≤ m ∧ target (p m) ∈ alloccurringstates (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p))" 
  hence "Suc n ≤ Suc m ∧ target (p m) ∈ insert (target (p n)) (image target (range (suffix (Suc n) p)))" by simp
  moreover from this have "image target (range (suffix (Suc m) p)) ⊆ image target (range (suffix (Suc n) p))" using image_subset_inf by metis
  ultimately have "insert (target (p m)) (image target (range (suffix (Suc m) p))) ⊆ insert (target (p n)) (image target (range (suffix (Suc n) p)))" by auto
  thus "alloccurringstates (target (p m)) (inf (suffix (Suc m) p)) ⊆ alloccurringstates (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p))" by simp
qed

lemma alloccurrinstatessuffixsuffixvalidinfpath:  "n ≤ m ∧ validinfpath M s p ⟹ alloccurringstates (target (p m)) (inf (suffix (Suc m) p)) ⊆ alloccurringstates (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p))"
proof-
  assume "n ≤ m ∧ validinfpath M s p"
  hence "(n = m ∧ validinfpath M s p) ∨ n < m" by auto
  moreover have "n < m ⟹ target (p m) ∈ alloccurringstates (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p))"
    unfolding alloccurringstatesalternative apply auto
    using less_natE apply metis
    done
  ultimately have "n ≤ m ∧ target (p m) ∈ alloccurringstates (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p))" by auto
  thus "alloccurringstates (target (p m)) (inf (suffix (Suc m) p)) ⊆ alloccurringstates (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p))" by (rule occuringstatessuffixsuffix)
qed

lemma somesuffix_actionrelentlessly :
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  shows "validinfpath M s p ∧ a ∉ A s (inf p) ⟹ (∃n. alloccurringstates (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) ⊆ {s. ¬Q a s})"
proof-
  assume assum1: "validinfpath M s p ∧ a ∉ A s (inf p)"
  hence "(∀s ∈ alloccurringstates s (inf p). ¬Q a s) ∨ (∃i. ∀s ∈ alloccurringstates (target (p i)) (inf (suffix (Suc i) p)). ¬Q a s)" unfolding assms allsuffixes_def by simp 
  moreover {
    assume "∀s ∈ alloccurringstates s (inf p). ¬Q a s"
    hence "alloccurringstates (source (p 0)) (inf (suffix 0 p)) ⊆ {s. ¬Q a s}" using assum1 by (auto simp: validinfpath_def)
  }
  moreover {
    assume "∃i. ∀s ∈ alloccurringstates (target (p i)) (inf (suffix (Suc i) p)). ¬Q a s"
    hence "∃i. alloccurringstates (source (p (Suc i))) (inf (suffix (Suc i) p)) ⊆ {s. ¬Q a s}" using assum1 by (auto simp: validinfpath_def)
  }
  ultimately show "∃n. alloccurringstates (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) ⊆ {s. ¬Q a s}" by blast
qed

lemma relentlesslreachable_onallsuffixes: "a ∈ relentlesslyreachable M B s p ⟹ allsuffixes s p (λs p. a ∈ relentlesslyreachable M B s p)"
  unfolding relentlesslyreachable_def allsuffixes_def
  apply (cases p; simp)
  apply (simp add: add.commute less_diff_conv)
  using add_Suc_right add_Suc_shift apply metis
  done

lemma relentlessly_onallsuffixes: 
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  shows "a ∈ A s p ⟹ allsuffixes s p (λs p. a ∈ A s p)"
  unfolding assms allsuffixes_def
  apply (cases p; simp)
  apply (simp add: add.commute less_diff_conv)
  using add_Suc_right add_Suc_shift apply metis
  done

lemma somesuffix_onlyrelentlessly :
  assumes "finite (-B)"
  and "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  shows "validinfpath M s p ⟹ (∃n. allsuffixes (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) (λs p. {a. Q a s} -B ⊆ A s p))"
proof-
  assume assum1: "validinfpath M s p"
  have "∃n. allsuffixes (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) (λs p. {a. Q a s} ∩ -B ⊆ A s p)"
    apply (rule inductfiniteset[where ?A="-B"])
    apply (simp add: assms)
    apply (simp add: allsuffixes_def)
  proof-
    fix a A'
    assume "a ∈ - B - A' ∧ (∃n. allsuffixes (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) (λs p. {a. Q a s} ∩ A' ⊆ A s p))"
    then obtain n where assum2: "a ∈ - B - A' ∧ allsuffixes (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) (λs p. {a. Q a s} ∩ A' ⊆ A s p)" by auto
    have "a ∈ A (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) ∨ a ∉ A (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p))" by simp
    moreover {
      assume "a ∈ A (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p))"
      hence "allsuffixes (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) (λs p. a ∈ A s p)" by (rule relentlessly_onallsuffixes[OF assms(2)])
      hence "allsuffixes (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) (λs p. {a. Q a s} ∩ insert a A' ⊆ A s p)" using assum2 unfolding allsuffixes_def by blast
    }
    moreover {
      assume "a ∉ A (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p))"
      moreover have validsubpath: "validinfpath M (source (p n)) (suffix n p)" using assum1 by simp
      ultimately have "(∃m. alloccurringstates (source ((suffix n p) m)) (inf (suffix m (suffix n p))) ⊆ {s. ¬Q a s})" by (subst somesuffix_actionrelentlessly[OF assms(2)]; blast)
      then obtain m where anotenabled: "allsuffixes (source (p (n + m))) (inf (suffix (n + m) p)) (λs p. ¬Q a s)" unfolding alloccurringstatesalternative allsuffixes_def by auto
      have "allsuffixes (source ((suffix n p) m)) (inf (suffix m (suffix n p))) (λs p. {a. Q a s} ∩ A' ⊆ A s p)" apply (rule suffixallsuffixesinf) using validsubpath assum2 by blast
      hence "allsuffixes (source (p (n + m))) (inf (suffix (n + m) p)) (λs p. {a. Q a s} ∩ A' ⊆ A s p)" by simp
      hence "allsuffixes (source (p (n + m))) (inf (suffix (n + m) p)) (λs p. {a. Q a s} ∩ (insert a A') ⊆ A s p)" using anotenabled unfolding allsuffixes_def by simp
      hence "∃n. allsuffixes (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) (λs p. {a. Q a s} ∩ insert a A' ⊆ A s p)" by blast
    }
    ultimately show "∃n. allsuffixes (source (p n)) (inf (suffix n p)) (λs p. {a. Q a s} ∩ insert a A' ⊆ A s p)" by blast
  qed
  moreover have "⋀s. {a. Q a s} ∩ -B = {a. Q a s} -B" by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma notfaircontradiction :
  assumes "¬allsuffixes s (inf p) (λs p. Q s p ⊆ alloccurringactions p)"
  and "Q s (inf p) ⊆ Q (target (p 0)) (inf (suffix (Suc 0) p))"
  shows "∃n a. a ∈ Q (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p)) ∧ a ∉ alloccurringactions (inf (suffix (Suc n) p))"
proof-
  {
    assume "¬ Q s (inf p) ⊆ alloccurringactions (inf p)"
    then obtain a where "a ∈ Q s (inf p) ∧ a ∉ alloccurringactions (inf p)" by auto
    hence "a ∈ Q (target (p 0)) (inf (suffix (Suc 0) p)) ∧  a ∉ alloccurringactions (inf (suffix (Suc 0) p))" using assms by auto
    hence "∃n a. a ∈ Q (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p)) ∧ a ∉ alloccurringactions (inf (suffix (Suc n) p))" by blast
  }
  thus ?thesis using assms(1) unfolding allsuffixes_def by auto
qed

lemma P_alternative :
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  and "P = (λs p. allsuffixes s p (λs p. A s p -B ⊆ alloccurringactions p))"
  and "⋀n a. a ∈ A (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p)) -B ⟹ a ∈ alloccurringactions (inf (suffix (Suc n) p))"
  shows "P s (inf p)"
proof-
  have "A s (extendfinpath [p 0] (inf (suffix (Suc 0) p))) = A (target (p 0)) (inf (suffix (Suc 0) p))" by (rule relentlessly_pred; simp add: assms)
  hence "A s (inf p) ⊆ A (target (p 0)) (inf (suffix (Suc 0) p))" by simp
  hence "¬P s (inf p) ⟹ ∃n a. a ∈ A (target (p n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) p)) -B ∧ a ∉ alloccurringactions (inf (suffix (Suc n) p))" unfolding assms(2) by (subst notfaircontradiction; auto)
  thus ?thesis using assms by auto
qed

text ‹Defining violating paths, using ‹freeuntiloccurrence›.›

definition freeuntiloccurrence :: "('a, 's) path ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 'a set ⇒ bool" where
"freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e = ((∃i. ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (pref i p)) ∧ action (ind i p) ∈ α⇩e)
  ∨ ¬occurs α⇩f p)"

definition violating :: "('a, 's) path ⇒ 'a rexp ⇒ 'a set ⇒ 'a set ⇒ bool" where
"violating p ρ α⇩f α⇩e = (∃i. match ρ (pref i p) ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (suff i p) α⇩f α⇩e)"

lemma violatingempty [simp] : "violating p One α⇩f α⇩e = freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e"
proof-
  have "violating p One α⇩f α⇩e = (∃i. (pref i p) = [] ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (suff i p) α⇩f α⇩e)" by (simp add : match_def violating_def)
  moreover have "... = (∃i. (i = 0 ∨ p = fin []) ∧ freeuntiloccurrence (suff i p) α⇩f α⇩e)" by auto
  moreover have "... = (freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e)" using nosuffix by metis
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed

text ‹Definition of ‹freeuntiloccurrence› does not specify that ‹i› is within the length of the path.
But if the action occurs only outside the bound, then it does not occur.›

lemma occursoutsidebound : 
  assumes "∃i ≥ length p'. ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p')) ∧ action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e"
  shows "¬occurs α⇩f (fin p')"
  using assms take_all by metis

lemma freeuntiloccurrence_inbound : "freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e = (¬occurs α⇩f p ∨ (∃i ∈ indicespath p. ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (pref i p)) ∧ action (ind i p) ∈ α⇩e))"
  apply (cases p; simp add: freeuntiloccurrence_def del: occurssimps)
  using occursoutsidebound leI apply blast+
  done

text ‹The existence of a progressing path that is ‹α⇩f› free until occurrence of ‹α⇩e› can be split into 4 cases.›

lemma existfreeuntiloccurrenceprogressing_cases_pred [simp] :
  assumes "⋀p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ⟹ P s (fin p) = locked M B s'"
  shows "(∃p. validpath M s p ∧ freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e ∧ P s p) = 
 ((∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (fin p') ∧ locked M B s') ∨ 
  (∃p' s'. validfinpath M s p' s' ∧ (∃i < length p'. ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p')) ∧ action (p'!i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ locked M B s') ∨
  (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧ ¬occurs α⇩f (inf p') ∧ P s (inf p')) ∨
  (∃p'. validinfpath M s p' ∧  (∃i. ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p')) ∧ action (p' i) ∈ α⇩e) ∧ P s (inf p')))"
  (is "?L = ?R")
proof
  assume ?L
  then obtain p where "validpath M s p ∧ freeuntiloccurrence p α⇩f α⇩e ∧ P s p" by auto
  hence assum1: "validpath M s p ∧ (¬occurs α⇩f p ∨ (∃i ∈ indicespath p. ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (pref i p)) ∧ action (ind i p) ∈ α⇩e)) ∧ P s p" using freeuntiloccurrence_inbound by auto
  {
    fix finp
    assume assum2: "p = fin finp"
    hence "validfinpath M s finp (laststate s finp) ∧ (¬occurs α⇩f (fin finp) ∨ (∃i ∈ indicespath (fin finp). ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (pref i (fin finp))) ∧ action (ind i (fin finp)) ∈ α⇩e)) ∧ locked M B (laststate s finp)" using assum1 validpath.simps(1) validfinpathlaststate assms by metis
    hence "validfinpath M s finp (laststate s finp) ∧ (¬occurs α⇩f (fin finp) ∨ (∃i < length finp. ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (take i finp)) ∧ action (finp!i) ∈ α⇩e)) ∧ locked M B (laststate s finp)" by auto
    hence ?R by blast
  }
  moreover {
    fix infp
    assume "p = inf infp"
    hence "validinfpath M s infp ∧ (¬occurs α⇩f (inf infp) ∨ (∃i. ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i infp)) ∧ action (infp i) ∈ α⇩e)) ∧ P s (inf infp)" using assum1 by auto
    hence ?R by blast
  }
  ultimately show ?R by (cases p)
next
  have "⋀p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ (¬occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∨ (∃i<length p. ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (take i p)) ∧ action (p ! i) ∈ α⇩e)) ∧ locked M B s' ⟹ validpath M s (fin p) ∧ (¬occurs α⇩f (fin p) ∨  (∃i∈indicespath (fin p). ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (pref i (fin p))) ∧ action (ind i (fin p)) ∈ α⇩e)) ∧ P s (fin p)" using assms by auto
  moreover have "⋀p. validinfpath M s p ∧ (¬occurs α⇩f (inf p) ∨ (∃i. ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (prefix i p)) ∧ action (p i) ∈ α⇩e)) ∧ P s (inf p) ⟹ validpath M s (inf p) ∧ (¬occurs α⇩f (inf p) ∨  (∃i∈indicespath (inf p). ¬occurs α⇩f (fin (pref i (inf p))) ∧ action (ind i (inf p)) ∈ α⇩e)) ∧ P s (inf p)" by auto
  ultimately show "?R ⟹ ?L" apply (simp only: freeuntiloccurrence_inbound) by blast
qed

lemma invariantextension_pred : 
  assumes "⋀s. enabledactions M s = {} ⟹ P s"
  and "∄p s'. validfinpath M s p s' ∧ P s'"
  shows "∃a s'. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M ∧ (∄p s''. validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ P s'')"
proof-
  have "enabledactions M s ≠ {}"
  proof
    assume "enabledactions M s = {}"
    hence "validfinpath M s [] s ∧ P s" using assms(1) by simp
    thus False using assms(2) by blast
  qed
  then obtain a s' where res1 : "(s, a, s') ∈ transition M" using actionenabled by metis
  let ?t = "(s, a, s')"
  have "∄p s''. validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ P s''"
  proof
    assume "∃p s''. validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ P s''"
    then obtain p s'' where "validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ P s''" by auto
    hence "validfinpath M s (?t # p) s'' ∧ P s''" using res1 by simp
    thus False using assms(2) by blast
  qed
  thus ?thesis using res1 by auto
qed

lemma invariantextension : 
  assumes "∄p s''. validfinpath M s p s'' ∧ enabledactions M s'' = {}"
  shows "∃a s'. (s, a, s') ∈ transition M ∧ (∄p s''. validfinpath M s' p s'' ∧ enabledactions M s'' = {})"
  apply (rule invariantextension_pred)
  using assms apply blast+
  done

text ‹Defining functions to structurally create infinite paths (that are complete)›

abbreviation laststate_nonexhaustive :: "('a, 's) finpath ⇒ 's" where
"laststate_nonexhaustive p ≡ target (last p)"

lemma laststate_laststate_nonexhaustive : "p ≠ [] ⟹ laststate s p = laststate_nonexhaustive p"
  by (cases p; simp)

function recursiveconcpaths :: "('s ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath) ⇒ 's ⇒ nat ⇒ 's × 'a × 's" where
"recursiveconcpaths succ s n = (if succ s = [] then undefined else (if n < length (succ s) then (succ s)!n else (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s)) (n - length (succ s)))))"
  by auto
termination 
  apply (relation "measure (λ(succ,s,n). n)")
  apply auto
  apply (subgoal_tac "n > 0")
  apply simp
  using length_greater_0_conv apply fastforce
  done

fun ithpath :: "('s ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath) ⇒ 's ⇒ nat ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath" where
"ithpath succ s 0 = succ s" |
"ithpath succ s (Suc i) = succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (ithpath succ s i))"

lemma ithpath_right : "ithpath succ s (Suc i) = ithpath succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s)) i"
  by (induct i; simp)

fun concipaths :: "('s ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath) ⇒ 's ⇒ nat ⇒ ('a, 's) finpath" where
"concipaths succ s 0 = []" |
"concipaths succ s (Suc i) = succ s @ concipaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s)) i"

lemma concipaths_right : "concipaths succ s (Suc i) = concipaths succ s i @ ithpath succ s i"
  apply (induct i arbitrary: s)
  apply (simp)
  apply (simp add: ithpath_right del: ithpath.simps)
  done

lemma ithpath_somesucc : 
  assumes "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S')"
  shows "∃s' ∈ S'. ithpath succ s i = succ s'"
  by (induct i; auto simp: assms)

lemma ithpath_laststate :
  assumes "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S')"
  shows "laststate_nonexhaustive (ithpath succ s i) ∈ S'"
  by (induct i; simp add: assms)

lemma predicate_ithpath : 
  assumes "P (succ s) ∧ s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. P (succ s) ⟶ P (succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s))) ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S')"
  shows "P (ithpath succ s i)"
  apply (induct i)
  apply (simp add: assms)
proof-
  fix i
  have "P (ithpath succ s (Suc i)) ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (ithpath succ s i) ∈ S'" by (induct i; simp add: assms)
  thus "P (ithpath succ s (Suc i))" by (simp add: assms)
qed

lemma ithpath_notempty : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S') ⟶ ithpath succ s i ≠ []"
  apply (induct i arbitrary : s)
  apply simp
   using ithpath_right apply metis
  done

lemma allithpath_notempty : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S') ⟹ (∀j < i. ithpath succ s j ≠ [])"
  using ithpath_notempty by metis

lemma lengthconcipaths : "(∀j < i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ (length (concipaths succ s i)) ≥ i"
  apply (induct i)
  apply simp
  apply (simp only : concipaths_right)
proof-
  fix i
  assume IH : "(∀j<i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ i ≤ length (concipaths succ s i)"
  assume assum1 : "∀j<Suc i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []"
  hence "i ≤ length (concipaths succ s i)" using IH by auto
  moreover have "Suc 0 ≤ length (ithpath succ s i)" by (simp add: leI assum1)
  ultimately show "Suc i ≤ length (concipaths succ s i @ ithpath succ s i)" by auto
qed

lemma recursiveconcpaths_ithpath : "m = length (concipaths succ s i) ∧ k < length (ithpath succ s i) ∧ (∀j ≤ i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ recursiveconcpaths succ s (m + k) = (ithpath succ s i) ! k"
  apply (induct i arbitrary : m s)
  apply simp
proof-
  fix i m s
  assume IH : "(⋀m s. m = length (concipaths succ s i) ∧ k < length (ithpath succ s i) ∧  (∀j≤i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ recursiveconcpaths succ s (m + k) = ithpath succ s i ! k)" 
  assume assum1: "m = length (concipaths succ s (Suc i)) ∧ k < length (ithpath succ s (Suc i)) ∧ (∀j≤Suc i. ithpath succ s j ≠ [])"
  hence "m + k ≥ length (succ s) ∧ succ s ≠ []" by auto
  hence "recursiveconcpaths succ s (m + k) = recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s)) ((m - length (succ s)) + k)" using assum1 by auto
  moreover have "... = ithpath succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s)) i ! k"
    apply (rule IH)
    using assum1 apply auto
    using ithpath_right assum1 Suc_le_mono apply metis+
    done
  moreover have "... = ithpath succ s (Suc i) ! k" by (simp only: ithpath_right)
  ultimately show "recursiveconcpaths succ s (m + k) = ithpath succ s (Suc i) ! k" by simp
qed

lemma take_all_but_last : "l ≠ [] ⟹ (take (length l - 1) l) @ [l ! (length l - 1)] = l" 
proof-
  assume assum1: "l ≠ []"
  hence "(take (length l - 1) l) @ [l ! (length l - 1)] = (take (length l - 1) l) @ [hd (drop (length l - 1) l)]" by (simp add: hd_drop_conv_nth)
  moreover have "... = l" by (simp add: take_hd_drop assum1)
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma subsequence_eq_list : "length l = (j - i) ∧ (∀k. k≥i ∧ k<j ⟶ w k = l!(k - i)) ⟹ subsequence w i j = l"
  apply (simp add: subsequence_def)
  apply (induct j arbitrary: l; simp)
  apply auto
proof-
  fix j l 
  assume IH : "(⋀l'. length l' = j - i ∧ (∀k. i ≤ k ∧ k < j ⟶ l ! (k - i) = l' ! (k - i)) ⟹ map w [i..<j] = l')"
  assume assum1: "length l = Suc j - i"
  hence "length (take (j - i) l) = j - i" by auto
  moreover have "∀k. i ≤ k ∧ k < j ⟶ l ! (k - i) = (take (j - i) l) ! (k - i)" by auto
  ultimately have "map w [i..<j] = take (j - i) l" using IH by metis
  hence "map w [i..<j] @ [l ! (j - i)] = (take (j - i) l) @ [l ! (j - i)]" by auto
  moreover assume "i ≤ j"
  ultimately have "l ≠ [] ∧ map w [i..<j] @ [l ! (j - i)] = (take (length l - 1) l) @ [l ! (length l - 1)]" using assum1 by auto
  thus "map w [i..<j] @ [l ! (j - i)] = l" using assum1 take_all_but_last by metis
qed
  
lemma subsequence_recursiveconcpaths : "n = length (concipaths succ s i) ∧ k = length (ithpath succ s i) ∧ (∀j ≤ i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ subsequence (recursiveconcpaths succ s) n (n + k) = ithpath succ s i"
  apply (rule subsequence_eq_list)
proof-
  assume assum1: "n = length (concipaths succ s i) ∧ k = length (ithpath succ s i) ∧ (∀j≤i. ithpath succ s j ≠ [])"
  have "(∀m. n ≤ m ∧ m < n + k ⟶ recursiveconcpaths succ s m = ithpath succ s i ! (m - n))"
    apply (rule allI)
  proof
    fix m
    assume assum2: "n ≤ m ∧ m < n + k"
    hence "m - n < length (ithpath succ s i)" using assum1 by auto
    hence "recursiveconcpaths succ s (n + (m - n)) = (ithpath succ s i) ! (m - n)" using recursiveconcpaths_ithpath assum1 by metis
    thus "recursiveconcpaths succ s m = ithpath succ s i ! (m - n)" by (simp add: assum2)
  qed
  thus "length (ithpath succ s i) = n + k - n ∧ (∀m. n ≤ m ∧ m < n + k ⟶ recursiveconcpaths succ s m = ithpath succ s i ! (m - n))" using assum1 by auto
qed

lemma existsconcipaths : "(∀j < i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ concipaths succ s i = prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)"
  apply (induct i arbitrary: s)
  apply simp
   apply (simp only: concipaths_right)
proof-
  fix i s
  assume IH : "(⋀s. (∀j<i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ⟹ concipaths succ s i = prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s))"
  assume assum1 : "(∀j<Suc i. ithpath succ s j ≠ [])"
  hence "prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = concipaths succ s i" using IH by auto
  moreover have "prefix (length (concipaths succ s i @ ithpath succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = 
    (prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)) @ (subsequence (recursiveconcpaths succ s) (length (concipaths succ s i)) (length (concipaths succ s i) + length (ithpath succ s i)))" 
    by (simp add: subsequence_append)
  moreover have "(subsequence (recursiveconcpaths succ s) (length (concipaths succ s i)) (length (concipaths succ s i) + length (ithpath succ s i))) = ithpath succ s i"
    by (simp add: assum1 subsequence_recursiveconcpaths)
  ultimately show "concipaths succ s i @ ithpath succ s i = prefix (length (concipaths succ s i @ ithpath succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)" by auto
qed

lemma concipaths_nth : "(∀j < i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ∧ n < i ⟹ (concipaths succ s i) ! n = recursiveconcpaths succ s n"
proof-
  assume assum1 : "(∀j < i. ithpath succ s j ≠ []) ∧ n < i"
  hence length : "length (concipaths succ s i) ≥ i " by (simp add: lengthconcipaths)
  moreover have "concipaths succ s i = prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)" using assum1 existsconcipaths by metis
  ultimately have "(concipaths succ s i) ! n = (prefix (length (concipaths succ s i)) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)) ! n" by simp
  moreover have "... = recursiveconcpaths succ s n" using length assum1 by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma suffix_recursiveconcpaths : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S') ⟹ ∃s' ∈ S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix i (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s')))"
  apply (induct i)
proof-
  assume "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S')"
  hence "succ s ≠ [] ∧ s ∈ S' ∧ suffix 0 (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop 0 (succ s)) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s)))" by auto
  thus "∃s' ∈ S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix 0 (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s')))" by blast
next
  fix i
  assume IH : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s∈S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S') ⟹ ∃s'∈S'. ∃j<length (succ s'). suffix i (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s')))"
  moreover assume assum1: "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s∈S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S')"
  ultimately obtain j s' where "s' ∈ S' ∧ j < length (succ s') ∧ suffix i (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s')))" by auto
  moreover have "Suc i = i + 1" by auto
  ultimately have res1: "s' ∈ S' ∧ j < length (succ s') ∧ suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = suffix 1 (conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s'))))" using suffix_suffix by metis
  hence "length (succ s') = Suc j ∨ length (succ s') > Suc j" by auto
  moreover {
    assume assum2: "length (succ s') = Suc j"
    hence "suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s'))" using res1 by simp
    moreover have "... = conc (drop 0 (succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s')))) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s')))))" using res1 assum1 by auto
    moreover have "0 < length (succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s'))) ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s') ∈ S'" using res1 assum1 by auto
    ultimately have "∃s'∈S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s')))" by metis
  }
  moreover {
    assume "length (succ s') > Suc j"
    moreover have "s' ∈ S' ∧ suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) =  conc (drop (Suc j) (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s')))" using Suc_le_eq res1 by auto
    ultimately have "∃s'∈S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s')))" by auto
  }
  ultimately show "∃s'∈S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix (Suc i) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s')))" by auto
qed

lemma suffix_recursiveconcpathslaststate : "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate s (succ s) ∈ S') ⟹ ∃s' ∈ S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix i (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate s' (succ s')))"
proof-
  assume assum1: "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate s (succ s) ∈ S')"
  hence "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S')" using laststate_laststate_nonexhaustive by metis
  then obtain s' j where "s' ∈ S' ∧ j < length (succ s') ∧ suffix i (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s')))" using suffix_recursiveconcpaths by metis
  moreover from this have "laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s') = laststate s' (succ s')" using laststate_laststate_nonexhaustive assum1 by metis
  ultimately show "∃s' ∈ S'. ∃j < length (succ s'). suffix i (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate s' (succ s')))" by auto
qed

lemma suffix_recursiveconcpathsrelentlessly : 
  assumes "A = (λs p. {a. allsuffixes s p (λs p. ∃s' ∈ alloccurringstates s p. Q a s')})"
  shows "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S') ∧ a ∈ A (target (recursiveconcpaths succ s n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) (recursiveconcpaths succ s))) ⟹ ∃s' p. s' ∈ S' ∧ a ∈ A s' (inf (recursiveconcpaths succ s')) ∧ suffix (Suc n) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc p (recursiveconcpaths succ s')"
proof-
  assume "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S') ∧ a ∈ A (target (recursiveconcpaths succ s n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)))"
  hence assum1: "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ laststate s (succ s) ∈ S') ∧ a ∈ A (target (recursiveconcpaths succ s n)) (inf (suffix (Suc n) (recursiveconcpaths succ s)))" using laststate_laststate_nonexhaustive by metis
  then obtain s' j where assum2: "s' ∈ S' ∧ j < length (succ s') ∧ suffix (Suc n) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate s' (succ s')))" using suffix_recursiveconcpathslaststate by metis
  moreover have "A (target (recursiveconcpaths succ s n)) (inf (conc (drop j (succ s')) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate s' (succ s'))))) = A (laststate s' (succ s')) (inf (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate s' (succ s'))))" by (rule relentlessly_infextendpath[OF assms])
  ultimately have "a ∈ A (laststate s' (succ s')) (inf (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate s' (succ s'))))" using assum1 by metis
  thus "∃s' p. s' ∈ S' ∧ a ∈ A s' (inf (recursiveconcpaths succ s')) ∧ suffix (Suc n) (recursiveconcpaths succ s) = conc p (recursiveconcpaths succ s')" using assum1 assum2 by auto
qed

lemma unfoldrecursiveconcpaths : 
  assumes "succ s ≠ []"
  shows "recursiveconcpaths succ s = conc (succ s) (recursiveconcpaths succ (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s)))"     
  using assms by auto

lemma source_eq_target :
  assumes "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ (source ((succ s) ! 0)) = s ∧ laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s) ∈ S')"
  shows "laststate_nonexhaustive (ithpath succ s n) ∈ S' ∧ source ((ithpath succ s (Suc n)) ! 0) = laststate_nonexhaustive (ithpath succ s n)"
  apply (induct n)
  apply (simp add: assms)
   unfolding ithpath.simps using assms apply blast
  done

lemma lasttarget_eq_targetithpath : 
  assumes "ithpath succ s n ≠ []"
  shows "laststate_nonexhaustive (concipaths succ s (Suc n)) = laststate_nonexhaustive (ithpath succ s n)"
  by (simp add: concipaths_right assms del: concipaths.simps)

lemma laststate_suc :
  "((λs. laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s)) ^^ Suc n) s = ((λs. laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s)) ^^ n) (laststate_nonexhaustive (succ s))"
  by (induct n; simp)

lemma validinfpathconc :
  "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ (∃s' ∈ S'. validfinpath M s (succ s) s')) ⟹ validinfpath M s (recursiveconcpaths succ s)"
  apply (simp add: validinfpath_def del: recursiveconcpaths.simps)
proof
  assume "s ∈ S' ∧ (∀s ∈ S'. succ s ≠ [] ∧ (∃s' ∈ S'. validfinpath M s (succ s) s'))"
